casebody.data:
WILLIAM T. & NORMA P. HOUGH, PLAINTIFF-APPELLANT, v. TAXATION DIVISION DIRECTOR, DEFENDANT-RESPONDENT. Superior Court of New Jersey Appellate Division Submitted May 6, 1981 Decided May 8, 1981.

Before Judges ALLCORN, PRESSLER and FURMAN.

The determination of the Tax Court is affirmed.
